name: Lake Rot
description:
In Syracuse, at some distant time...

City King: a faceless ruler. 

Big Tower: a place of comfort, prosperity, and safety. 

Everyone in Syracuse has been moved into Big Tower, one by one, under City King's order. Everyone but you.

You've been sent to do some tasks for City King. Could it finally be your time to be given shelter and care in this desolate, unlivable environment? Or are you being singled out for something more sinister?

This game was made in a few weeks for a school project. Since then I've changed the color palette and added a menu, but the game could still use some music and more player choices. I may add these in the future, but for now, enjoy Lake Rot!
